Translations.Text: minisa veta nisækavama kalayak pæmina tibe, ehi ohu gæna (mese yæyi ) pavasannata taram vastuvak lesa (minisa) nositiyeya
niyata vasayenma musu vu sukranu binduvakin api minisa mævvemu. api ohu pariksanayata lak karannemu. eheyin api ohu savan diya hæki ha bæliya hæki keneku bavata pat kalemu
ema margaya veta niyata vasayenma api ohuta maga penvuyemu. ohu krtavediyeku lesa ho gunamakuveku lesa ho sitiya hæka
niyata vasayenma api deviyan pratiksepa kalavunata damvæl da gela vilamgu da ævilena ginna da sudanam kalemu
niyata vasayenma dæhæmiyo ehi kapuru misræti (kusalana men vu) bhajana valin panaya karati
(eya) ulpataki. emagin allahge gættan panaya karati. eya ovun (kæmæti tænakata nadiyak se) gala yannata salasvati
ovuhu (tamange) bharaya itu karati. tavada ehi haniya pætira pavatina dinayata ovuhu biya veti
tavada e (ahara) kerehi vu ælmak (ovun tula tibunada) dilindata da anathayata da sirakaruvata da ovuhu ahara sapayati
“api numbalata ahara sapayanuye allahge trptiya venuveni. numbalagen kisidu pratiphalayak ho kisidu tuti pidumak ho api apeksa nokaramu” (yæyi pavasati)
apage paramadhipati vetin muhunehi aprasanna ha pilikula vidaha pana dinayakata niyata vasayenma api biyavemu
eheyin allah edina napuren ovun mudava ganneya. tavada satuta ha somnasa ovun hamuvannata salasanneya
ovun ivasa siti bævin svarga uyana ha seda redi ovunata ohu pratiphala vasayen pirinæmuveya
ovuhu ædan mata hansivemin sititi. ovuhu ehi hiru rasmiya ho adhika sitala ho nodakinu æta
tavada ehi hevana ovun mata pahat va pavati. valu bara palaturu pokuruda ehi elli pavati
ridiyen vu bhajana ha palingu valin yut gurulettu rægena ovun vata gaman karavanu labati
eya ridiyen vu palinguya. ovuhu ehi pramanaya sakas kara gannoya
sanjabil (inguru) misræti panayen yut kusalana ehi ovunata panaya sandaha denu labati
ehi salsabil yæyi handunvanu labana ulpatakda veyi
sada yauvanaye pasu vana daruvan ovun vata yati. numba ovun dutu vita eya visiranu læbu mutu yæyi sitanu æta
tavada numba ehi dutu vita atisaya pritiya ha visala rajyayak lesa numba dakinu æta
sinindu ha kola pæhæti ghana seda ængalum ovun mata veyi. ovunata ridiyen vu valalu palanndavanu labati. tavada ovunge paramadhipati ovunata pirisidu panaya sapayanu æta
niyata vasayenma meya numbala sandaha vu pratiphalayak viya. tavada numbalage utsahaya tuti puda karanu labannak viya
niyata vasayenma al kuranaya api numba veta kotas vasayen pahala kalemu
eheyin numbage paramadhipatige nitiya venuven ivasimen sitinu. ovun aturin kisidu papiyekuta ho deviyan pratiksepa kala kisidu ayakuta ho numba avanata novanu
tavada ude savasa numbe paramadhipatige namaya suvisuddha karanu
tavada ratriyedi ohuta sujud karanu. tavada ratriyedi digu velavak numba ohu suvisuddha karanu
niyata vasayenma ovuhu melovata priya karati. namut ovunata pasu va æti bærærum dinaya ata hæra damati
api ovun mævvemu. tavada ovunge handipat saktimat kalemu. tavada apa abhimata kale nam ovun venuvata ovun men vuvan api venas kota pat karannemu
niyata vasayenma meya upadesaki. eheyin kavareku abhimata karanne da tama paramadhipati veta margayak lesa ganitva
allah abhimata karanne nam misa numbala abhimata nokarannehuya. niyata vasayenma allah sarva gnaniya. ati siyum gnanavantaya
ohu abhimata karana aya ohuge karunava tulata ætulat karanu æta. tavada aparadhakaruvan vanahi ovunata vedaniya danduvamak ohu sudanam kara æta
